equipment.effect_cn: 一面标准钢盾。能格挡大多数物理攻击，却会让我暴露在闪电之下。
equipment.effect_en: A standard steel shield. Blocks most physical attacks but leaves me vulnerable to lightning.

equipment.effect_cn: 提升元素抗性，但会削弱物理防御。
equipment.effect_en: Enhances elemental resistance at the cost of reduced physical defense.
